title: Is We Dumb? | Puzzle. Snorlax. Armpits. Tuxedo.
description:
How insanely difficult would it be to exist in this world if your knees and elbows bent in the opposite direction? Let's talk about that, buying puzzles that have pornographic images on them, ignoring an active robbery to play Pokemon Go, thinking the Super Bowl was this last Sunday, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/MDp66Uh39eE

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com
